it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.Assets
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class acts as a container for every kind of resource that a player can have. Also all kind of bonuses and costs in terms of resources are represented with objects of this class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Fast constructor, utilized for parsing assets objects from file
